tool.name: get_gene_info_from_Ensembl
tool.description: Retrieves Gene information from Ensembl server using REST API

param.name: expand
param.label: Expand
param.help: Expands the search to include any connected features. e.g. If the object is a gene, its transcripts, translations and exons will be returned as well.

param.name: utr
param.label: UTR
param.help: Include 5' and 3' UTR features. Only available if the expand option is used.

param.name: format_selector
param.label: format
param.help: Specify the formats to emit from this endpoint

tool.help:
Simple wrapper for Ensembl REST API to retrieve gene information from Ensembl server.
Ensembl REST: ensembl_.
.. _ensembl: http://rest.ensembl.org/documentation/info/lookup_post
